name: The Junk Pile
description:
Due to a rather bumpy ride during De Feet's development, it spawned 5 games which ended up to be really bad quality.

Instead of restricting access to these, I have decided that one page will be dedicated to all of those stinkers, deservedly named "The Junk Pile".

I am not providing support on any of these games. They have been collected here for archival purposes only. I am creating a much better De Feet game anyway.

Only the first two are currently released.

Games:

  • De Feet: Platformer
  • De Feet: Platformer 2
